movie_title: Is gaming a sport? 6 Minute English
introduction: Improve your English vocabulary and speaking with 6 Minute English! At a recent event in Australia o

vocabulary.definition: a statement that makes something seem larger, better, worse, etc., than it really is
vocabulary.example: He said he's been waiting for ages, but that's probably an exaggeration.

vocabulary.definition: having a strong desire to win or be the best at something
vocabulary.example: She is very competitive and always wants to be the top performer in her team.

vocabulary.definition: engaged in a specified activity as one's main paid occupation rather than as a pastime
vocabulary.example: After years of practice, he finally turned professional in his favorite sport.
The company's revenue reached a multi-billion-dollar milestone this year.

vocabulary.definition: economic activity concerned with the processing of raw materials and manufacture of goods in factories
vocabulary.example: The automotive industry is facing challenges due to the shift towards electric vehicles.

vocabulary.definition: a particular area of activity, especially one of a particular type
vocabulary.example: The art scene in the city is vibrant and diverse, showcasing various talents.
